products.title: Bigtreetech BTT Pi V2 2G Ram - 32GB eMMC
products.body_html:
BIGTREETECH Pi 2 & CB2 are developed by BIGTREE Technology Co., LTD.. Based on the improvements of the first-generation products, our new-generation computer single boards have significantly improved computing and storage performance. In addition, to meet the DIY needs of 3D printer users, we have optimized the design to provide a more user-friendly experience.  

For BTT PI CB2 Listing: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/bigtreetech-btt-pi-cb2

Key Features:

  • Friendly to 3D Printer Users. The customised computer single board for 3D printer users not only supports a variety of expansion functions, but also can be connected to 12V/24V powered 3D printers without an adapter, making it very friendly to 3D printer users.
  • Rockchip RK3566.RK3566 processor and powerful storage function. Pi 2 not only has built-in RAM 2G, ROM 32G eMMC, but also supports SD card and 2M solid-state drive expansion to meet your basic needs for running Klipper on Debian storage software, documents, and surveillance videos.
  • Support DSI/CSI extension. The camera can be connected through the DSI interface; connected to the FPC port on the BTT PITFT screen through the DSI interface, or connected to the BTT HDMI screen through the HDMI interface.
  • Support 5G Network.Blazing-fast dual-band WiFi and reliable Gigabit Ethernet ensure seamless connectivity for remote printing and file transfers.


Note:

1. Pi 2 does not have an SPI interface. If you need to use an SPI screen, you need to connect it with IO2 CAN or EBB and U2C.

2. The size of CB2 is the same as that of CB1/CB1 eMMC and Raspberry Pi 4B/CM4, but the size of Pi 2 is slightly longer than that of Raspberry Pi 4B. Please refer to the size chart of Pi 2 to choose the appropriate installation location.

Documentation: 

https://github.com/bigtreetech/CB2

products.title: LDO Toolhead PCB for Afterburner Voron
products.body_html:
The LDO Toolhead PCB is designed for wiring Afterburner Voron toolheads, including the Switchwire and Voron V2.4, as well as stealth burners with modified parts.

 

Documentation: 

Documentation: https://docs.ldomotors.com/en/voron/toolhead_harness

SB Documentation: https://github.com/MotorDynamicsLab/LDOVoron2/tree/main/STLs/LDOSBCW2MountCover

Install Guide (And printed parts for CW2 with this PCB): https://ldomotion.com/guides/voron-stealthburner-clockwork-2-ldo-toolhead-pcb-revised

Neopixel is not supported on board, as show in second photo with no spare port, you would have run an separated cable loom.

Pinout

The table below briefly describes the purpose of each port located on the tool head PCB. 

PCB Label Name Connector Description
HEF Hotend Fan* JST-XH-2P Fan port for cooling the hotend heatsink. Note that only 24V fans are compatible
PCF Part Cooling Fan* JST-XH-2P Port for part cooling fan. Note that only 24V fans are compatible
HE0 Hotend Heater* E0508 Ferrule Port for hotend heater cartridge.
TH0 Hotend Thermistor JST-XH-2P Thermistor port for hotend
XES X Endstop JST-XH-2P X endstop port. Only used in Switchwire builds, unused in V2 and Trident.
PROBE Probe JST-XH-3P Probe port. Accepts 24V inductive probes, also compatible with klicky probes.
E-STEP E Stepper Motor JST-XH-4P Extruder stepper motor port
Toolhead Cable Microfit3-14P This port connects to the 14pin toolhead cable

products.title: BTT SKR Pico V1.0 Control Board Compatible with Raspberry PI for Voron V0
products.body_html:
The BTT SKR Pico V1.0 is a purpose-built control board for VORON V0 and V0.1, V0.2 3D printers, engineered by Bigtreetech. Built around the RP2040 ARM Cortex-M0+ microcontroller, it delivers reliable performance in a compact form factor. The board features a modern design with integrated fuse protection for safe power management and USB Type-C connectivity for seamless communication. It's fully compatible with Raspberry Pi and BTT Pi boards, allowing you to stack your single-board computer directly onto the SKR Pico to maximise internal printer space. Ideal for VORON enthusiasts seeking a proven, space-efficient control solution.

(Do note, you will require raspberry pi to use this mainboard as MCU is only support by Klipper). 

  • Design for Voron 0, 0.2, 0.1 3D Printers
  • Using Raspberry Pi ARM Cortex M0 (RP2040)
  • High quality components such as Murata capacitors

What is Included:

  • 1x Bigtreetech SKR Pico V1.0

Documentation: 

https://github.com/bigtreetech/SKR-Pico

Hardware Information/Wiring: https://github.com/bigtreetech/SKR-Pico/blob/master/Hardware/BTT%20SKR%20Pico%20V1.0-PIN.pdf

Manufacturer Information:

products.title: BIQU Panda Edge - Blade Scraper
products.body_html:
The BIQU Panda Edge is a handy 3D printer tool made to remove prints safely and easily. It works perfectly with Bambu Lab’s scraper grips and blades.

  • Strong magnets let you attach it to any metal surface, like the sides of Bambu Lab X1 or P1S printers. You can also download an STL file to print your own desktop holder.
  • Built from tough anodised 6061 aluminium with CNC precision, it’s durable and looks great. The SK5 steel blades last a long time and can be swapped out quickly with a single screw.
  • For best results and to protect your build plate, press the scraper flat against the surface when removing prints, instead of prying at a steep angle.

What is Included:

Panda Edge

  • 1x Panda Blade Handle with SK5 Steel Blade

Blades/3pcs

  • 3x SK5 Steel Blade

Printed Handle: https://makerworld.com/en/models/12702-bambu-scraper-grip#profileId-12703

products.title: Cookiecad TPU Filament 1.75mm - 1kg
products.body_html:
Cookiecad are really excited to introduce you to Cookiecad TPU, beautiful filament in unique and interesting colors.

Empty Plastic Spool ~177g

If you haven't printed with glitter filaments before, please note: Glitter filaments have a higher chance of clogging.

A >0.4mm nozzle is recommended for glitter/funfetti filled. 

Printing Settings

For best results, dry filament using a filament drier before use. Keep in an airtight container for medium/long term storage with silica desiccant. [If you hear popping or inconsistent extrusion while purging filament, suggest drying before printing for best results] Filament Drying Guide

Nozzle Temperature 200°C - 230°C
Build Plate Temperature 25°C - 60°C*
Build Surface Material Works well with most common build surfaces.
Build Surface Treatment Typically none required. Some surfaces such as glass work best with PVA glue stick or Magigoo.
Cooling Fan ON
Printing Speed Recommended: 20 mm/s - 100 mm/s (tested up to 300mm/s)*
Retraction

The ideal retraction settings vary from printer to printer. If you find the retraction settings are causing gaps in your part, the following settings may help.
Direct Drive: Retraction distance of 0.5 - 1mm with retraction speed of 20mm/s
Bowden: Retraction distance of 2 - 3mm with retraction speed of 20 - 40mm/s

Note: Flexible filaments such as TPU tend to benefit from slow and consistent feed rates, filament sensor or extra drag can cause inconsistent extrusions. 
Drying Recommendation ~65°c for 4-8hr (Only dry if filament is wet, over drying/repeat drying can damage filament) (Filament Dryer Guide)
Storage Keeping filament in an airtight container with new/dried desiccant.
Support Material

Single Extrusion:
Self Support

Idex/Tool Changer:
DREMC PETG

Based on 0.4 mm nozzle. Printing conditions may vary with different printers and nozzle diameters.

products.title: Creality K1 Series CFS Upgrade Accessory Kit (K1, K1 Max, K1C, K1 SE)
products.body_html:
The Creality CFS Upgrade Accessory Kit for K1 series (CFS is not included) (Note: This is AU/Australia version)

CFS: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/cfs-creality-filament-system (10% CFS when purchased with this upgrade kit, add both item to cart and discount auto apply)

With support for up to 16 colors and automatic filament switching, you no longer have to deal with manual swaps.

Features: 

  • Designed for Multicolor 3D printing: Promising multicolor creativity with an easy and complete upgrade pack.
  • Dedicated New Extruder: A cutter and run-out sensor are integrated for accurate filament change.
  • Quick Connection to CFS: Enabling auto RFID filament recognition, auto filament switch & relay, etc.

Compatibility:

  • K1
  • K1 Max
  • K1C
  • K1 SE

Note 1: Not suitable for K1C 2025.

Note 2: Require Integrated nozzle (older 2023 version require upgraded hotend with unicorn) 

Note 3: You will need to use USB Port, so offline printing won't be possible via USB, you will require connect via local network via LAN/Wifi for local upload files or through Creality Cloud over the Internet. 

Documentation: 

Note: This is consider a advance upgrade, please ensure you read/watch through the install guide before purchase. 

More Information: https://wiki.creality.com/en/k1-flagship-series/CFSUK

Community Install Video (K1 Max): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zItif1Nosdc

[Note: Requires printed top lid for printing ABS/ASA (enclosed materials): https://wiki.creality.com/en/k1-flagship-series/CFSUK/print-abs-filament , Community (not tested): https://www.printables.com/search/models?q=creality+k1+riser]

  • Please update the firmware (Creality OS) with the included USB drive upon the upgrade. For subsequent updates, you can use the OTA function. (Note: You will need computer to move the firmware files from folder into root directory of the USB, if you need re-download the firmware file, please see above more information link for download link of firmware)
  • While using CFS, the print size of K1, K1C and K1 SE changes to 220 × 215 × 250 mm, and the print size for K1 Max changes to 300 × 295 × 300 mm. The print size stays unchanged if you use the stock spool holder.
  • Ensure your extruder stepper motor wiring is well cable managed, as if its loose the movement to cut/purge materials may break the wiring if its caught. 

Shipping Note:

Shipped in well protected long box (from manufacturer). So this item cannot be combination shipped unless item is also lead screw or similar long items, so expect additional freight when bundling shipping with other items, linear rails or other lead screw are bundle shipped when applicable. If we able to bundle smaller item within same box, we update shipping total before capturing your payment, otherwise you can reach out support for customised quote.

products.title: Bigtreetech Manta E3EZ V1.0 & 5x EZ2209 For Ender 3
products.body_html:
The BIGTREETECH MANTA E3EZ V1.0 motherboard for Ender 3 integrates a CM4 style core board and EZ2209 drivers, enabling a streamlined Klipper upgrade. It reduces wiring complexity and saves space by directly connecting components, enhancing printer performance efficiently.


What is Included: 

Kit Include: [Depending on your selection]

  • 1x Manta E3EZ Control Board
  • 5x TMC2209 EZ

Kit Include: [Depending on your selection]

  • 1x Manta E3EZ Control Board
  • 5x TMC2209 EZ
  • 1x CB1

CB1/CM4 is not included in option 1, you can source CB1 here: https://store.dremc.com.au/products/bigtreetech-cb1-alternative-to-raspberry-pi-cm4 or Source CM4 from official raspberry pi distributor (Support Klipper only).

Note 1: Please ensure you have enough clearance for the CB1/CM4 sd card when closing up case, for Ender 3 Pro you will be break the one the support tab. Please refer to more information/video overview. 

Note 2: CM4/CB1 are mounted using M2 bolt (not the M2.5 included in heat sink for CB1). (M2x10)

 

Documentation: 

More Information: https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-E3EZ

Install Overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1GVJOlPipb0

User Manual: https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-E3EZ/blob/master/BIGTREETECH%20Manta%20E3EZ%20V1.0%20User%20Manual.pdf

Pin out: https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-E3EZ/blob/master/Hardware/BIGTREETECH%20Manta%20E3EZ%20V1.0-PIN.png

Klipper Firmware Config Example: https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-E3EZ/tree/master/Firmware/Klipper

Printed Bracket (ender 3 v2): https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-E3EZ/tree/master/Ender3%20V2%20STL

Printed Mount (Ender 5): https://github.com/bigtreetech/Manta-E3EZ/tree/master/Ender5%20STL


Features: 

  • 32bit 64MHz ARM Cortex-M0+ series STM32G0B1RE MCU.
  • TPS5450-5A power supply chip supports DC12/24V power input, current output rated at 5A max continuous and 6A max instantaneous, sufficient power supply for Raspberry Pi.
  • The thermistor circuit is protected to prevent MCU damage from shorted heated bed and heater cartridge connections.
  • MCU firmware can be upgraded via SD card, or use DFU via Klipper’s make flash command.
  • BTB connectors are adopted between the motherboard and core board, allowing the choice of other core board solutions in addition to CM4.
  • Onboard SPI and UART mode of EZ driver, which can be used directly without a jumper.
  • Onboard DIAG pin, easily configurable with jumpers.
  • Support power loss recovery, filament runout sensor, auto power-off, BLTouch, RGB, etc.
  • High-efficiency MOSFET for less heat generation.
  • Replaceable fuse for easy maintenance.
  • Onboard SPI interface for connecting acceleration sensor to enable Klipper’s input shaping.
  • The temperature sensor interface adopts a high-precision pull-up resistor.
  • Each motor driver module can select the corresponding motor voltage by jumper caps
  • The motor power supply supports up to 56V, and for the larger voltage when using EZ5160, an isolation chip is used to protect the main control from shorts

products.title: Bigtreetech EBB 36/42 Gen 2 Can Bus / USB for Klipper Hotend Tool Head
products.body_html:
A significant advancement in toolboard engineering. Comprehensive protection minimises damage risk, while integrated signal amplification ensures exceptional CAN and USB stability. Easily toggle between CAN and USB modes using a straightforward jumper. 

Features:

  • Circuit protection is implemented on most input and output to safeguard against damage from accidental connection errors.

  • Easily switch between CAN and USB connectivity using a single jumper, with the passthrough port automatically adjusting to the new setting.

  • Signal boosters are included to ensure reliable USB connectivity.

  • The unit has been tested for long-term performance at chamber temperatures of up to 75°C (a fan is recommended for use at temperatures exceeding 60°C).

  • A 3-pin tacho fan is designed for detecting hotend fan failures.

  • Voltage selection (5V/24V) is available for all fans.

  • An I²C port is provided for connecting environmental or Eddy sensors.

  • A dedicated thermistor is included for monitoring motor driver temperature.

  • The device features three PWM-controllable fan outputs, complete with short-circuit and thermal protection.

  • Reset and boot buttons have been repositioned for easier access.

  • The main control chip is an ARM Cortex-M0+ STM32G0B1CBT6, operating at 64MHz.

  • Grounded mounting holes are designed for effective ESD dissipation.

What is Included: 

Depending on Selection

  • 1x Toolhead PCB EBB36 Gen 2 or EBB42 Gen 2
  • 1x EBB USB Adapter
  • 1x 2200mm (2.2m) TX30 Cable
  • 1x Connector Crimp/Connector Kit

Documentation: 

Guide 36: https://bttwiki.com/EBB36_GEN2.html

Guide 42: https://bttwiki.com/EBB42_GEN2.html

Github: https://github.com/bigtreetech/EBB

Youtube Video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IqWxSF5fDMc

products.title: Mini-Fridge (Clicky-Clack) Door Kit for Voron V0.2 (LDO)
products.body_html:
Mini-Fridge Door Kit designed by TheVoronModder and inspired by Whoppingpochard's Clicky-Clack doors for V2 and Trident. This is a great one piece door makes for smooth and satisfying opening and closing (and clicking!) with nice sound.

This kit comes with a Cast Acrylic front panel[Not pictured] and all the extrusions and hardware required (no printed parts). Please note, this requires the 100mm extrusions for top hat which is standard on an LDO V0.2 Kit, so if you had upgrade kit please ensure its 100mm upgrade kit used. Note: Printed parts are not included. 

Please note - because extrusions were anodized in a different batch than your LDO printer kit there might be a slight variation between color. This is true for all LDO Mini-Fridge Door Kits sold.

For more information please see the GitHub (including STL files)

Shipping Note: 

We ship items with other flat items to prevent damaged cause irregular shape with some other items. This item cannot be combined with non-flat items for shipping, so please expect additional freight costs when bundling it with smaller parts or filament. If we can bundle smaller items within the same box, we will update the shipping total before processing your payment. Otherwise, feel free to contact support for a customised quote.

products.title: Phaetus aeWorthy™ ASA GF Filament 1kg
products.body_html:
Phaetus aeWorthy™ ASA-GF is an ASA-based filament specially developed for 3D printing and it is reinforced with 10% chopped glass fiber. Phaetus aeWorthy™ ASA-GF has excellent anti-ultraviolet aging performance, which is very suitable for printing large size models and outdoor applications and compared with other ASA filaments, it has a much lower odor and excellent dimensional stability.

Printing Settings

For best results, dry filament using a filament drier before use or print from dryer running or dry box. Keep in an airtight container or included mylar bag for medium/long term storage with silica desiccant. [If you hear popping or inconsistent extrusion while purging filament, suggest drying before printing for best results] Filament Drying Guide

 

Nozzle Temperature 250°C - 270°C
Build Plate Temperature 100°C - 110°C
Build Surface Material Works well with most common build surfaces. We recommended PEI Build Plate (Smooth/Texture suitable)
Build Surface Treatment Typically none required. Some surfaces such as glass work best with PVA glue stick or Magigoo .
Enclosure / Heater Chambers

At minimal passive enclosure. 
60-80˚C+ may be required for higher density and larger geometries.

Recommend VOC/Air Filtering/fume extraction or print in well ventilated room with fume extraction. 
Cooling Fan LOW for better surface quality
OFF for better strength
Printing Speed 30 mm/s - 90 mm/s
Retraction The ideal retraction settings vary from printer to printer. If you find the retraction settings are causing gaps in your part, the following settings may help.
Direct Drive: Retraction distance of 0.5 - 1mm with retraction speed of 20mm/s
Bowden: Retraction distance of 2 - 3mm with retraction speed of 20 - 40mm/s
Drying Recommendation  ~50°c for 4-6hrs (Only dry if filament is wet, over drying/repeat drying can damage filament)  (Filament Dryer Guide)
Storage Keeping filament in an airtight container with new/dried desiccant.

Based on 0.6 mm nozzle. Printing conditions may vary with different printers and nozzle diameters.

Spool Size:

  • Spool Diameter: (+/-1mm)
  • Spool Hub Diameter: (+/-1mm)
  • Spool Width: (+/-1mm)

Datasheet:  

  • Datasheet

products.title: MK8 Heater Block Kit (Aluminum) for Creality Ender 3 / 5 Series with Silicon Sock
products.body_html:
This Heater Block Kit is the perfect accessory for your Creality Ender 3 /5 Series MK8 printer. Made from Aluminum, the Heater Block is designed to provide superior thermal conductivity and improved heating performance. The included Silicon Sock ensures durability and helps keep your print head safe. 

Product Specs: 

  • Heater Block Material: 6061 Aluminium Alloy
  • Max temperature: 280c 
  • Aluminium Block made by Runice, Sock made by Trianglelabs

Product Include: 

  • Include TL MK8 Aluminium Heater Block (support both bean style thermistor, M3 Stud thermistor. 
  • Thermistor/Heater Hardware (Retaining screw for bean style, and heater grub screw)
  • MK8 high quality silicon socks (depending on batch, it may be blue or orange)

(Suitable for any MK8 Style Hotend)

products.title: Bigtreetech Panda Knomi Smart Display Companion for Bambulab Printers
products.body_html:
Screen Only (Printed part required: https://github.com/bigtreetech/PandaKnomi/tree/master/Print_Files)

The Panda Knomi is a cutting-edge interactive display designed exclusively for Bambulab 3D printers. Combining sleek transparent-matte aesthetics with advanced functionality, it transforms your printer into a smart, visually engaging workstation. Featuring a vivid wide-Viewing screen, wireless connectivity, and plug-and-play compatibility, Knomi delivers real-time printer status updates, customizable GIF animations, and effortless OTA upgrades. Its modular design even supports DIY 3D-printed accessories for personalized styling. Elevate your printing experience with Knomi—where tech meets creativity.  

Key Features:

  • Sleek Matte Transparency. A futuristic, semi-transparent matte shell seamlessly integrates with Bambulab A1 printers, blending durability with minimalist tech appeal.

  • Vivid Wide-Viewing Screen. High-definition color display mounted on the print head doubles as a decorative accent while showing critical print metrics at a glance.

  • Wireless & Emotionally Intelligent. Hassle-free Wi-Fi pairing enables remote monitoring and control. Personalize your workflow with animated GIFs (editable via web) for a playful, humanized interaction.

  • Plug-and-Play Power. Directly powered by the printer’s native port—no cables needed. Expandable with Panda’s dedicated power module for uninterrupted operation.

  • DIY 3D-Printable Accessories. Download and print custom mounts, cases, or decorative add-ons to tailor Knomi’s look and functionality to your workspace.

  • Future-Ready OTA Updates. Regular over-the-air enhancements ensure new features, optimizations, and compatibility upgrades, keeping Knomi at the forefront of innovation.

Documentation: 

https://github.com/bigtreetech/PandaKnomi/tree/master

products.title: Milo - Casa Enclosure Sub Kit by LDO
products.body_html:
Milo - Casa Enclosure Sub Kit by LDO.

PLEASE NOTE: This kit includes the non electronic components to build a Milo Casa (panels, frame and hardware based on your selection). Items like the e-stop and fans are not part of this kit.

[Some extra unit will be sold, until sold out, this won't be restocked unless LDO make future plan for batch 2]

[Pre-Order Closed]

LDO are releasing these kits on a pre-order only basis. The pre-order cut off is the end of January 2025. The Pre-Order Deposit will open towards early January 2025, once we confirm shipping details.

LDO will then produce the ordered quantity only and shipping will begin at the end of March; Kits should be in your hands at the end of May/Start of June.

Because of the delay we anticipate receiving this, we are opening pre-sales with a simple $100 + shipping (just panel kit) or $200 deposit + shipping (frame & hardware kit), which is in the form of a refundable in useable gift card value if you no longer wish to go ahead, or small payment deduction to cover payment gateway fee for refund back to original payment method, as stated in return policy for any pre-order items. 

Once Casa enclosures ship to us from LDO, we will invoice you the updated total balance remaining of the item price, one listed as non deposit. We expect these to ship ~Late May/Early June 2025. We will subtract deposit paid from full price listing, you will have til kit arrives to pay of the order. 

Note: This is enclosure kit for https://store.dremc.com.au/products/millennium-machines-milo-v1-5-kit-by-ldo

Printed Parts are not included

NOTE: This is a mechanical kit only. No electronics included (such as E-stop or fans)

 

What is Casa?

Casa is a CNC enclosure kit for Millennium Machines CNC by LDO (Fits Milo V1.5, Milo V2.0 and Miley V2.0)

Using a CNC mill is undoubtedly a messy experience! Chips, dust and swarf go everywhere. Enter Casa, the home your Millennium Machines builds have been waiting for. Contain that mess and make clean-up a breeze. Looking to upgrade your electronics or fed up of flipping Milo over to work on them? Casa also has an enormous electronics bay protected from the mess and with room for all of the mods you desire. 

Key Features:

  • Fully Enclosed
  • Dedicated electronics bay including fan cooling (not included)
  • External E-stop (not included)
  • Chip tray (Printed Parts - not included)

Documentation:

Github
Assembly docs

products.title: BIQU Panda Revo Hotend for Bambu Lab P1 Series & X1 Series
products.body_html:
Direct swap hotend for bambu lab P1S and X1C printers. This allows you to use Revo nozzles and increases the flow over the stock hotend and quicker nozzle swap. 

Comes with the Revo HF 60W heater, and a 0.4mm Brass high flow Revo Nozzle. 

Included:

  • 1 x Panda Revo Hotend (For X1 or P1 - Depending on Selection)
  • 1 x Sticker
  • 2 x product information cards

Documentation:

  • Install Video(X1 Series): https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OCwElVVaNM4
  • Video Overview: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dNmWJcONe5E

Precautions:

Please be careful when installing the hotend. To obtain detailed instructions on the installation process, please scan the QR code card found inside the package.

We recommenced disabling "Disable Long Retraction" it can cause melted materials into cold end before cutting. This can lead to the filament getting stuck and potentially causing an AMS failure or issue such as partial clog that can show as "heat creep". 

Technical specifications:

Hotend length 47.3mm
Max. temperature 300°C
Max. flow rate 40 mm³/s
Nozzle material Brass
Nozzle diameter 0.4mm
Nozzle type E3D Revo™ High Flow
Heater: power/voltage 60W, 24V
Thermistor NTC100k
Compatibility Bambu Lab P1P, P1S, X1C

products.title: Sovol SV06 All Metal Hotend Kit & Fan Duct
products.body_html:
Original SV06 Replacement Hotend Assembly For Sovol SV06

Features: 

  • Brass Nozzle 0.4mm
  • 24V 40W Heater
  • Copper + Titanium Alloy Heat Break

What is Included: 

  • 1x Replacement Assembly (Include Sock)
  • 1x SV06 Fan Duct [Not Pictured]
  • 2x Retaining Bolts

Documentation: 

Hot tightened at factory, but we do recommenced you re-tighten nozzle again, you need to re-tightened at +10-20c your regular printing temperature (example 280c for all metal version) or at max temperature of support hotends when you change the nozzle. 

Documentation: https://support.dremc.com.au/en/support/solutions/articles/51000318231-how-to-hot-tighten-nozzle-change-a-nozzle

Note 1: For printing extensive abrasive filament printing such as Carbon Fibre/Glass filled filament, please use the All Metal Kit (All Metal) with hardened steel nozzle- 4001030113 instead of the bi-metal hotend (Pro Kit). During our testing, we found the bi metal hotend does not last long before abrasive wear at the bi metal heat break. 

Note 2: These are direct hot-swap replacement, thermistor is not replaceable, if you need replaceable heater blocks, please see below options: Aluminum Heater Block  / Copper Heater Block [Require self assembly and does not include retaining blocks] similar you can source any MK8 nozzles or CR-6SE/sprite Specific for stock silicon sock. Heat Break options available in copper+titanium alloy.

The cutter lifespan varies based on the material's abrasiveness. Highly abrasive materials require more frequent blade replacements. We recommend inspecting the cutter every 800–1000 hours or earlier if frequently printing multi-colour designs using 2–3 spools of standard materials to ensure consistent cutting quality.

products.title: LDO Positron v3.2 DIY 3D Printer Kit
products.body_html:
Does NOT include any 3D printed parts

In Stock Batch 3 (In Stock Ready to Ship)

Introducing The Positron: The Ultimate Portable 3D Printer

The Positron is a portable, foldable 3D printer tailored for professionals requiring reliable printing wherever they are—be it the office, a worksite, or while traveling internationally.

  • Assembly Guides:https://www.ldomotion.com/p/assembly/Positron-V32
  • Bom: https://docs.ldomotors.com/en/Positron/positron_v32/Positron_V32_home

Innovative Design:

  • Compact and Portable: The Positron fits into a standard filament box and features a clever kinematics system that maximizes its 180mm³ build volume while printing upside down.
  • Quick Deployment: Go from folded to ready to print in just about a minute.

Travel-Friendly:

  • Airport-Ready: The Positron has passed through major U.S. airports without issue when TSA guidelines were followed. Travel with peace of mind, but be sure to adhere to specific checkpoint instructions.
  • Low Power Consumption: Runs on a 24 Volt, 200 Watt power supply, making it ideal for printing on the move—on a boat, in a van, or even on a cruise ship.

Customization and Connectivity:

  • Expandable Main Board: Add a Filament Runout Sensor, integrated PSU, extra cooling, and more to tailor The Positron to your needs.
  • Connectivity Options: For loading prints via Wi-Fi, Ethernet, or mass storage, regardless of how busy the venue is, you can always rely on USB and Ethernet connectivity!
  • We Use Klipper!: Using Klipper, this printer is your own! Customize the macros to make it do whatever it is you want, we made sure that all of the RGB lights are fully adressable.

Join the Community:

Explore more about The Positron and join the Wiki and Discord at https://positron3d.com. Share your projects, learn from others, and collaborate to push the limits of 3D printing.

Enjoy the freedom and versatility The Positron offers. Have fun, and let's print different!

Printer Specification:

180*180*165mm

Product Dimensions

200x200x70mm (Folded )                                                                                     200x200x270mm (Unfolded)

 

Net Weight

3Kg Approx.

1.75mm

250mm/s

8000mm/s2

V6 type 0.4mm

260℃

Glass Bed

85℃

Levelling Mode

Manual + IR Sensor

3.5” LCD Capacitive Touch Screen

Power Supply

Desktop 24V 200W

Slicing Software

Superslicer, OrcaSlicer etc.,

Firmware

Klipper

Raspberry Pi

CM4

Controller Board

Customized LDO Positron Mainboard

Batch 2(Nov) Pre-Order Information [Batch 2(Nov) Kits shipped!]: Batch 2(Nov) has dispatch from LDO late September 2024, and expected to arrive early-mid November (~30-45 days)* (This is based on batch 2 bom, just another batch dispatched at later date)

*All timelines above are our best estimate and do not guarantee an arrival time, until order has arrive and pass local customs.

products.title: V0.2 Metal toolhead carriage for V0.2 by HoneyBadger
products.body_html:
Introducing the v0.2 Metal Carriage by Honeybadger. This lightweight, yet sturdy toolhead mounting solution is designed to improve stiffness and enhance performance. It eliminates the speed penalty typically associated with metal parts while providing superior rigidity. The v0.2 Metal Carriage allows for better input shaper results and is available in both 7h and 9c configurations.

Specs:

  • Alum 6061
  • 2 tone finish
  • Light weight 14g for the 9c and 16 for the 7h

What you need to source:

  1. screws for mounting, 7h M2x4 uses and 9c uses M3x5 SHCS
  2. Time to enjoy this awesome mod.

products.title: LDO MGN12H Linear Rail with Carriage 300/350/400/450mm (Precision H)
products.body_html:
LDO is famous for their quality components and these linear rails are no exception, with super smooth operation you will have rails that don't have that dreaded crunch like the cheap ones you find elsewhere.

This is high precision guide way and carriage will offer better dimensional tolerance compare to typical rails standard/normal precision rails and offering ~40% better parallelism. Stainless 440c rails/carriages/balls ensure no rusting occurs in humid environments. 

Specification:

  • Material: Stainless Steel Linear Rail 440C
  • 1 Year Manufacturer Warranty
  • Precision: H (High)
  • Preload: Z1(LDO High Pre-Load)

Do you need custom length or specification? You can contact us for sample/bulk order.

Compatibility: 

These are perfect for upgrading your Voron 2.4 X axis from 2x mgn9h Rails which can make bed leveling difficult if not perfectly aligned. The singular MGN12H rail solves this issue. 

  • If you have a 300mm Voron you need the 350mm rail
  • If you have a 350mm Voron you need the 400mm rail
  • Other Rail is suitable for upgrading other 3D Printers for instance 300 for ender 3 and 450 for ender 5 plus, 330 for Ender 5 Pro Mercury Zero G 

These rails are also used in the standard BOM for the Voron Trident and Voron 2.4 Kit.

Documentation:

Note 1: Ensure you clean well and well lucubrate the block according to your environment and application.

Notes 2: Please note that the carriages are paired with the rails. They are not interchangeable, avoid removing from rail when possible. Clean rail/carriage before grease/oil. 

Documentation: https://support.dremc.com.au/a/solutions/articles/51000340319

Shipping Note: 

Shipped in well protected long box to ensure straightness of linear rail. So this item cannot be combination shipped unless item is also lead screw, so expect additional freight when bundling shipping with other items, linear rails or other lead screw are bundle shipped when applicable. If we able to bundle smaller item within same box, we update shipping total before capturing your payment, otherwise you can reach out support for customised quote. 

Data sheet:

Guideway Accuracy:

Accuracy Classes  Normal (C)
 High (H)
Dimensional tolerance of height H ± 0.04 ± 0.02
Dimensional tolerance of width N ± 0.04 ± 0.025
Pair Variation of height H 0.03 0.015
Pair Variation of width N 0.03 0.02
Pair Variation of width N (Master Rail) 0.07 0.04


Guideway Parallelism:

Rail Length (mm)
  Normal (C) μm
 High (H) μm
250 ~ 315 17 11
315 ~ 400 18 11
400 ~ 500 19 12
